Item type as System.Type

member.summary: Getting the specified image by the type and size of the image, which is stored in the SpaceVIL framework.
member.param:
An image type as SpaceVIL.Core.EmbeddedImage
Example: SpaceVIL.Core.EmbeddedImage.Gear (to get gear icon)

An image size as SpaceVIL.Core.EmbeddedImageSize (only 32x32 or 64x64)
Example: SpaceVIL.Core.EmbeddedImage.Size32x32 (to get an image in 32x32 pixels)
member.returns: Copy of image icon as System.Drawing.Bitmap

Base static item's condition.

Orientation enum.
Used in such items as scroll bars, sliders, wrap grid and etc.

Visibility types of item enum. Used in such items as scroll bars.

member.summary:
Item hovering rule types enum.
Values: Lazy, Strict.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Core.ItemHoverRule.Lazy
member.summary:
Hover function will return True if mouse cursor located inside rectangle area of its shape even if shape is not a rectangle.
Example: Function will return True If shape is triangle and mouse cursor located outside this triangle, but inside rectangle area that bounds this triangle.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Core.ItemHoverRule.Strict
member.summary: Hover function will return True only if mouse cursor located inside the shape of the item.

member.summary: The scene is constantly being redrawn.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem
member.summary:
The main interface of SpaceVIL environment. Contains all the necessary methods for rendering objects and interacting with them.
Implementations: BaseItem, Prototype, Primitive.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.SetHandler(SpaceVIL.CoreWindow)
member.summary: Setting the window to which the item will belong.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.GetHandler
member.summary: Getting the window to which the item will belong.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.SetParent(SpaceVIL.Prototype)
member.summary: Setting the parent of the item.
member.param: Parent as SpaceVIL.Prototype (Prototype is container and can contains children).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.GetParent
member.summary: Getting the parent of the item.
member.returns: Parent as SpaceVIL.Prototype (Prototype is container and can contains children).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.SetConfines
member.summary:
Setting the confines of the item relative to its parent's size and position.
Example: items can be partially (or completely) outside the container (example: ListBox), in which case the part that is outside the container should not be visible and should not interact with the user.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.SetConfines(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Setting the confines of the item relative to specified bounds.
Example: items can be partially (or completely) outside the container (example: ListBox), in which case the part that is outside the container should not be visible and should not interact with the user.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.SetMargin(SpaceVIL.Decorations.Indents)
member.summary: Setting the indents of an item to offset itself relative to its container.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.SetMargin(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Setting the indents of an item to offset itself relative to its container.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.GetMargin
member.summary: Getting the indents of an item to offset itself relative to its container.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.InitElements
member.summary: Initializing children if this IBaseItem is container (SpaceVIL.Prototype).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.SetStyle(SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style)
member.summary: Setting a style that describes the appearance of an item.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.GetCoreStyle
member.summary: Getting the core (only appearance properties without inner styles) style of an item.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.IsDrawable
member.summary:
Getting the drawable (visibility) status of an item. This property used in conjunction with the IsVisible() property.
Explanation: an item can be visible and invisible, in some cases the item can be located outside the container (example: SpaceVIL.ListBox), and it must be invisible so as not to waste CPU / GPU resources, but in some cases you must control the visibility of elements that are inside container and should be invisible (example: SpaceVIL.TreeView).
member.returns: True: if item is drawable (visible). False: if item is not drawable (invisible).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.SetDrawable(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Setting the drawable (visibility) status of an item. This property used in conjunction with the IsVisible() property.
Explanation: an item can be visible and invisible, in some cases the item can be located outside the container (example: SpaceVIL.ListBox), and it must be invisible so as not to waste CPU / GPU resources, but in some cases you must control the visibility of elements that are inside container and should be invisible (example: SpaceVIL.TreeView).
member.param: True: if item should be drawable (visible). False: if item should not be drawable (invisible).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.IsVisible
member.summary: Getting the visibility status of an item. This property may used in conjunction with the IsDrawable() property.
member.returns: True: if item is visible. False: if item is invisible.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.SetVisible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Setting the visibility status of an item. This property may used in conjunction with the IsDrawable() property.
member.param: True: if item should be visible. False: if item should be invisible.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.Release
member.summary: Method to describe disposing item's resources if the item was removed.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem.Effects
member.summary: Gettting access to manage visual effects of the item.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Core.IBehavior.GetHeightPolicy
member.summary: Getting height policy of an item's shape.Can be Fixed (shape not changes its size) or Expand (shape is stretched to all available space).

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style
member.summary: Style is a class that describes the appearance of an element. Can contains Styles for inner items.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Background
member.summary:
Background color of an item's shape. Attention: this property is required.
This property is System.Drawing.Color.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Foreground
member.summary:
Color of an item's text. Can be used only if the item contains text and in this case this property is required.
This property is System.Drawing.Color.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Font
member.summary:
Font of an item's text. Can be used only if the item contains text and in this case this property is required.
This property is System.Drawing.Font.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.WidthPolicy
member.summary:
Width policy of an item's shape. Can be Fixed (shape not changes its size) or Expand (shape is stretched to all available space). Attention: this property is required.
This property is SpaceVIL.Core.SizePolicy.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.HeightPolicy
member.summary:
Height policy of an item's shape. Can be Fixed (shape not changes its size) or Expand (shape is stretched to all available space). Attention: this property is required.
This property is SpaceVIL.Core.SizePolicy.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Width
member.summary: Width of an item's shape.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.MinWidth
member.summary:
Minimum width of an item's shape (shape cannot be smaller this value).
Default: 0.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.MaxWidth
member.summary:
Maximum width of an item's shape (shape cannot be bigger this value).
Default: 32767.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Height
member.summary: Height of an item's shape.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.MinHeight
member.summary:
Minimum height of an item's shape (shape cannot be smaller this value).
Default: 0.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.MaxHeight
member.summary:
Maximum height of an item's shape (shape cannot be bigget this value).
Default: 32767.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Alignment
member.summary:
Alignment of an item's shape relative to its container. Combines with alignment by vertically (Top, VCenter, Bottom) and horizontally (Left, HCenter, Right). Attention: this property is required.
This property is SpaceVIL.Core.ItemAlignment.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.TextAlignment
member.summary:
Alignment of an item's text. Combines with alignment by vertically (Top, VCenter, Bottom) and horizontally (Left, HCenter, Right). Can be used only if the item contains text and in this case this property is required.
This property is SpaceVIL.Core.ItemAlignment.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.X
member.summary: X axis position of left-top cornet of an item's shape. This property itself is mostly ignored. Used only when creating container-type items or with SpaceVIL.FreeArea.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Y
member.summary: Y axis position of left-top cornet of an item's shape. This property itself is mostly ignored. Used only when creating container-type items or with SpaceVIL.FreeArea.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Padding
member.summary:
Indents of an item to offset its children. Attention: this property is required.
This property is SpaceVIL.Decorations.Indents.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Spacing
member.summary:
Indents between children of a container type item. It is used mainly in containers.
This property is SpaceVIL.Decorations.Spacing.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Margin
member.summary:
Indents of an item to offset itself relative to its container. Attention: this property is required.
This property is SpaceVIL.Decorations.Indents.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Border
member.summary: Border for an item's shape.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Shape
member.summary:
A form of an item's shape. If not assigned, the shape is rectangular.
Format: System.Collections.Generic.List<System.Single[]>.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.IsFixedShape
member.summary:
A flag that determines if the shape of an item can be changed or not.
True: if shape can not be resized. False: if shape can be resised. Default: False.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.InnerShapes
member.summary:
A storage of shapes for future use. Note: not supported in the current version!
Format: System.Collections.Generic.List<SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem>.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.Shadow
member.summary: Shadow of an item's shape.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style.IsVisible
member.summary:
A flag that determines if an item is visible or not.
True: if visible. False: if not visible. Default: True.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.ItemsRefreshManager
member.summary: ItemsRefreshManager is a manager that allows you to add an item of a certain type to the queue for a forced refresh. It can be use with custom implementation of one of the types: shape, text, image. For example: a Bitmap change in an IImageItem implementation, a shape change in an IBaseItem implementation.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ItemsRefreshManager.SetRefreshShape(SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem)
member.summary:
Adding an IBaseItem implementation to the queue for a forced refresh.
Tips: use this function only if you want to refresh shape of an item, ITextContainer and IImageItem are not shapes.
member.returns: True: if adding is successfull. False: if an item is already in the refresh queue.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ItemsRefreshManager.SetRefreshText(SpaceVIL.Core.ITextContainer)
member.summary:
Adding an ITextContainer implementation to the queue for a forced refresh.
Tips: use this function only if you want to refresh text of an item, IBaseItem and IImageItem are not text.
member.returns: True: if adding is successfull. False: if an item is already in the refresh queue.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ItemsRefreshManager.SetRefreshImage(SpaceVIL.Core.IImageItem)
member.summary:
Adding an IImageItem implementation to the queue for a forced refresh.
Tips: use this function only if you want to refresh image of an item, IBaseItem and ITextContainer are not images.
member.returns: True: if adding is successfull. False: if an item is already in the refresh queue.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.WindowManager
member.summary: WindowManager is a static class that is designed to manage instances of a window and entire application. Provides control for changing render frequency, render type, vertical sync, adding/closing windows, exiting the app and more.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.WindowManager.SetRenderFrequency(SpaceVIL.Core.RedrawFrequency)
member.summary:
Setting the frequency of redrawing scene in idle state. The higher the level, the more computer resources are used. Default: SpaceVIL.Core.RedrawFrequency.Low
Can be:
VeryLow - 1 frame per second,
Low - up to 10 frames per second,
Medium - up to 30 frames per second,
High - up to 60 frames per second,
Ultra - up to 120 frames per second,

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.WindowManager.GetRenderFrequency
member.summary: Getting the current render frequency.
member.returns: The current render frequency as SpaceVIL.Core.RedrawFrequency.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.WindowManager.EnableVSync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Setting the vsync value. If value is 0 - vsync is OFF, if other value - vsync is ON. The total amount of FPS calculated by the formula: 1.0 / Math.Abs(value) * DisplayRefreshRate, so if value is 2 (or -2) and dysplay refresh rate is 60 then 1.0 / 2 * 60 = 30 fps. Default: 1 - ENABLE.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.WindowManager.GetVSyncValue
member.summary: Getting the current vsync value. If value is 0 - vsync is OFF, if other value - vsync is ON. The total amount of FPS calculated by the formula: 1.0 / Math.Abs(value) * DisplayRefreshRate, so if value is 2 (or -2) and dysplay refresh rate is 60 then 1.0 / 2 * 60 = 30 fps. Default: 1 - ENABLE.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.WindowManager.SetRenderType(SpaceVIL.Core.RenderType)
member.summary:
Setting the common render type. Default: SpaceVIL.Core.RenderType.Periodic.
Can be:
IfNeeded - the scene is redrawn only if any input event occurs (mouse move, mouse click, keyboard key press, window resizing and etc.),
Periodic - the scene is redrawn according to the current render frequency type (See SetRenderFrequency(type)) in idle and every time when any input event occurs,
Always - the scene is constantly being redrawn.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.WindowManager.AddWindow(SpaceVIL.CoreWindow)
member.summary: Adding a window to rendering queue. After adding the window shows up immediately.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.WindowManager.CloseWindow(SpaceVIL.CoreWindow)
member.summary: Closing the specified window if it exist in render queue.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.WindowManager.StartWith(SpaceVIL.CoreWindow[])
member.summary: Launching the applications and showing all specified windows.
member.param: A sequence of any amount of CoreWindow instances.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.WindowManager.AppExit
member.summary: Exiting the current application. All windows will be closed and all their EventClose will be executed.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.BaseItem.IsDrawable
member.summary:
Getting the drawable (visibility) status of an item. This property used in conjunction with the IsVisible() property.
Explanation: an item can be visible and invisible, in some cases the item can be located outside the container (example: SpaceVIL.ListBox), and it must be invisible so as not to waste CPU / GPU resources, but in some cases you must control the visibility of elements that are inside container and should be invisible (example: SpaceVIL.TreeView).
member.returns: True: if item is drawable (visible). False: if item is not drawable (invisible).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.BaseItem.SetDrawable(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Setting the drawable (visibility) status of an item. This property used in conjunction with the IsVisible() property.
Explanation: an item can be visible and invisible, in some cases the item can be located outside the container (example: SpaceVIL.ListBox), and it must be invisible so as not to waste CPU / GPU resources, but in some cases you must control the visibility of elements that are inside container and should be invisible (example: SpaceVIL.TreeView).
member.param: True: if item should be drawable (visible). False: if item should not be drawable (invisible).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.BaseItem.IsVisible
member.summary: Getting the visibility status of an item. This property may used in conjunction with the IsDrawable() property.
member.returns: True: if item is visible. False: if item is invisible.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.BaseItem.SetVisible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Setting the visibility status of an item. This property may used in conjunction with the IsDrawable() property.
member.param: True: if item should be visible. False: if item should be invisible.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown
member.summary:
ComboBoxDropDown is drop-down list implementation for ComboBox (see SpaceVIL.ComboBox). ComboBox do not contains ComboBoxDropDown in usual way (ComboBox.GetItems() does not return ComboBoxDropDown), they just connected with each other. Used for selecting option from the list. ComboBoxDropDown is a floating item (see SpaceVIL.Core.IFloating and enum SpaceVIL.Core.LayoutType) and closes when mouse click outside the ComboBoxDropDown area.
Contains ListBox.
Supports all events except drag and drop.
Notice: All floating items render above all others items.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.SelectionChanged
member.summary: Event that is invoked when one of the options is selected.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.Release
member.summary:
Disposing ComboBoxDropDown resources if it was removed.
Notice: This method is mainly for overriding only. SpaceVIL calls this method if necessary and no need to call it manually.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.ItemList
member.summary: ListBox for storing a list of options (SpaceVIL.MenuItem).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.GetText
member.summary: Getting the text of selected option.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.GetCurrentIndex
member.summary: Getting index of the current selected option in the list.
member.returns: Index of the current selected option

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.GetSelectedItem
member.summary: Getting current selected item in ItemList.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.SetCurrentIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Selecting an option from the list at the specified index.
member.param: Index of option in the list.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.ActiveButton
member.summary:
You can specify mouse button (see SpaceVIL.Core.MouseButton) that is used to open ComboBoxDropDown.
Default: SpaceVIL.Core.MouseButton.ButtonLeft.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.IsOutsideClickClosable
member.summary: Returns True if ComboBoxDropDown (see SpaceVIL.Core.IFloating) should closes when mouse click outside the area of ComboBoxDropDown otherwise returns False.
member.returns: True: if ComboBoxDropDown closes when mouse click outside the area. False: if ComboBoxDropDown stays opened when mouse click outside the area.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.SetOutsideClickClosable(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Setting boolean value of item's behavior when mouse click occurs outside the ComboBoxDropDown.
member.param: True: ComboBoxDropDown should become invisible if mouse click occurs outside the item. False: an item should stay visible if mouse click occurs outside the item.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.#ctor
member.summary: Default ComboBoxDropDown constructor. ComboBoxDropDown does not pass any input events and invisible by default.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.InitElements
member.summary:
Initializing all elements in the ComboBoxDropDown.
Notice: This method is mainly for overriding only. SpaceVIL calls this method if necessary and no need to call it manually.

member.summary: Getting number of options in the list.
member.returns: Number of options in the list.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.GetListContent
member.summary: Getting all existing options (list of SpaceVIL.IBaseItem objects).

member.summary: Adding option (or any SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem implementation) to the ComboBoxDropDown.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ComboBoxDropDown.RemoveItem(SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem)
member.summary: Removing option (or any SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem implementation) from the ComboBoxDropDown.
member.returns: True: if the removal was successful. False: if the removal was unsuccessful.

Mouse click arguments (cursor position, mouse button, mouse button press/release, etc.).

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.ContextMenu
member.summary:
ContextMenu is a menu for selecting one of the available options from the list that perform the assigned action. ContextMenu is a floating item (see SpaceVIL.Core.IFloating and enum SpaceVIL.Core.LayoutType) and closes when mouse click outside the ContextMenu area.
Contains ListBox.
Supports all events except drag and drop.
Notice: All floating items render above all others items.
ContextMenu does not pass any input events and invisible by default.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ContextMenu.ReturnFocus
member.summary: Property that allows to specify what item will be focused after ContextMenu is closed.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ContextMenu.ItemList
member.summary: ListBox for storing a list of options (SpaceVIL.MenuItem).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ContextMenu.GetSender
member.summary: Getting the item that invokes ContextMenu.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ContextMenu.ActiveButton
member.summary:
You can specify mouse button (see SpaceVIL.Core.MouseButton) that is used to open ContextMenu.
Default: SpaceVIL.Core.MouseButton.ButtonRight.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ContextMenu.IsOutsideClickClosable
member.summary: Returns True if ContextMenu (see SpaceVIL.Core.IFloating) should closes when mouse click outside the area of ContextMenu otherwise returns False.
member.returns: True: if ContextMenu closes when mouse click outside the area. False: if ContextMenu stays opened when mouse click outside the area.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ContextMenu.SetOutsideClickClosable(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Setting boolean value of item's behavior when mouse click occurs outside the ContextMenu.
member.param: True: ContextMenu should become invisible if mouse click occurs outside the item. False: an item should stay visible if mouse click occurs outside the item.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ContextMenu.#ctor(SpaceVIL.CoreWindow)
member.summary: Constructs a ContextMenu and attaches it to the specified window (see SpaceVIL.CoreWindow, SpaceVIL.ActiveWindow, SpaceVIL.DialogWindow). ContextMenu does not pass any input events and invisible by default.

member.summary: Constructs a ContextMenu with specified options and attaches it to the specified window (see SpaceVIL.CoreWindow, SpaceVIL.ActiveWindow, SpaceVIL.DialogWindow).

Frame cannot receive any events, so Frame is always in the SpaceVIL.Core.ItemStateType.Base state.

Grid is a class that represents a grid type container. Each element is in a specific grid cell.

Grid cannot receive any events, so Grid is always in the SpaceVIL.Core.ItemStateType.Base state.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.HorizontalStack
member.summary:
HorizontalStack is a class that represents a line type container (horizontal version). HorizontalStack groups items one after another using content alignment, margins, paddings, sizes and size policies. HorizontalStack implements SpaceVIL.Core.IHLayout.
By default ability to get focus is disabled.
HorizontalStack cannot receive any events, so HorizontalStack is always in the SpaceVIL.Core.ItemStateType.Base state.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.HorizontalStack.SetContentAlignment(SpaceVIL.Core.ItemAlignment)
member.summary:
Setting content alignment within HorizontalStack area.
Supports only: ItemAlignment.Left, ItemAlignment.HCenter, ItemAlignment.Right.
Default: ItemAlignment.Left.

Getting current content alignment.
Can be: ItemAlignment.Left, ItemAlignment.HCenter, ItemAlignment.Right.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.OpenEntryDialog
member.summary:
OpenEntryDialog is user interface element for browsing file system to select a file or folder to open or save. Support create/rename/delete files and folders, navigate shortcuts, file filtering.
Supports all events except drag and drop.

member.summary: Getting full path of selected fyle system entry.
member.returns: Full path of selected fyle system entry.

member.summary: Setting the default path that will be opened when OpenEntryDialog is shown.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.OpenEntryDialog.#ctor(System.String,SpaceVIL.Core.FileSystemEntryType,SpaceVIL.Core.OpenDialogType)
member.summary:
Constructs OpenEntryDialog with title text, entry type and dialog type.
Entry type can be FileSystemEntryType.File or FileSystemEntryType.Directory.
Dialog type can be OpenDialogType.Open or OpenDialogType.Save.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.OpenEntryDialog.#ctor(System.String,SpaceVIL.Core.FileSystemEntryType)
member.summary:
Constructs OpenEntryDialog with title text, entry type. Dialog type is OpenDialogType.Open.
Entry type can be FileSystemEntryType.File or FileSystemEntryType.Directory.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.OpenEntryDialog.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs OpenEntryDialog with title text. Entry type is FileSystemEntryType.File. Dialog type is OpenDialogType.Open.

member.summary:
Initializing all elements in the OpenEntryDialog.

member.summary: Refresh opened folder.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.OpenEntryDialog.AddFilterExtensions(System.String[])
member.summary:
Adding file filter extensions.
Rule: "filter name (*.ext1, *.ext2, *.extN) ; *.ext1, *.ext2, *.extN"
Example 1: "Text files (*.txt) ; *.txt"
Example 2: "Images (*.png, *.bmp, *.jpg) ; *.png, *.bmp, *.jpg"

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.OpenEntryDialog.Show(SpaceVIL.CoreWindow)
member.summary: Shows OpenEntryDialog and attaches it to the specified window (see SpaceVIL.CoreWindow, SpaceVIL.ActiveWindow, SpaceVIL.DialogWindow).

member.summary:
Setting style of the OpenEntryDialog.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.PopUpMessage
member.summary:
PopUpMessage is designed to display short quick messages to the user. PopUpMessage disappears after a specified period of time (default: 2 seconds), or you can prevent this by moving the cursor over PopUpMessage and closing it later manually.
Contains text, close button.
Supports all events except drag and drop.
By default PopUpMessage do not pass further any input events (mouse, keyboard and etc.).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.PopUpMessage.SetTimeOut(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Setting waiting time in milliseconds after which PopUpMessage will be closed.
Default: 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.IsDrawable
member.summary:
Getting the drawable (visibility) status of an item. This property used in conjunction with the IsVisible() property.
Explanation: an item can be visible and invisible, in some cases the item can be located outside the container (example: SpaceVIL.ListBox), and it must be invisible so as not to waste CPU / GPU resources, but in some cases you must control the visibility of elements that are inside container and should be invisible (example: SpaceVIL.TreeView).
member.returns: True: if item is drawable (visible). False: if item is not drawable (invisible).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.SetDrawable(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Setting the drawable (visibility) status of an item. This property used in conjunction with the IsVisible() property.
Explanation: an item can be visible and invisible, in some cases the item can be located outside the container (example: SpaceVIL.ListBox), and it must be invisible so as not to waste CPU / GPU resources, but in some cases you must control the visibility of elements that are inside container and should be invisible (example: SpaceVIL.TreeView).
member.param: True: if item should be drawable (visible). False: if item should not be drawable (invisible).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.IsVisible
member.summary: Getting the visibility status of an item. This property may used in conjunction with the IsDrawable() property.
member.returns: True: if item is visible. False: if item is invisible.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.SetVisible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Setting the visibility status of an item. This property may used in conjunction with the IsDrawable() property.
member.param: True: if item should be visible. False: if item should be invisible.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.IsPassEvents
member.summary:
Getting boolean value to know if this item can pass further any input events (mouse, keyboard and etc.).
Tip: Need for filtering input events.
member.returns: True: if this item pass on any input events. False: If this item do not pass any input events.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.IsPassEvents(SpaceVIL.Core.InputEventType)
member.summary: Getting boolean value to know if this item can pass further the specified type of input events (mouse, keyboard and etc.).
member.param: Type of input events as SpaceVIL.Core.InputEventType.
member.returns: True: if this item pass on the specified type of input events. False: If this item do not pass the specified type of input events.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.GetPassEvents
member.summary: Getting all allowed input events.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.GetBlockedEvents
member.summary: Getting all blocked input events.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.SetPassEvents(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Setting on or off so that this item can pass further any input events (mouse, keyboard and etc.).
member.param: True: if you want that this item may to pass on any input events. False: if you want that this item cannot to pass on any input events.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.SetPassEvents(System.Boolean,SpaceVIL.Core.InputEventType)
member.summary: Setting on or off so that this item can pass further the specified type of input events (mouse, keyboard and etc.).

Type of input events as SpaceVIL.Core.InputEventType.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.SetPassEvents(System.Boolean,SpaceVIL.Core.InputEventType[])
member.summary: Setting on or off so that this item can pass further the specified types of input events (mouse, keyboard and etc.).

Sequence of input event types as SpaceVIL.Core.InputEventType.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.Prototype.IsDisabled

member.summary: Setting True if you want that mouse is pressed on this item (mouse cursor located within item's shape and any of the mouse button is pressed) otherwise False.
member.param: True: if you want this item be mouse pressed. False: if you want this item be not mouse pressed.

Item's focusable property.

Setting content for this item.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.RadioButton
member.summary:
RadioButton is the basic implementation of a user interface radio button with the ability to be checked (others radio button becomes unchecked) or be unchecked. Contains text and indicator.
Supports all events except drag and drop.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem
member.summary:
ResisableItem is a special container that can move and resize by mouse input events while inside another container.
Te get full functionality try to use ResizableItem with SpaceVIL.FreeArea container.
Supports all events including drag and drop.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.ExcludeSides(SpaceVIL.Core.Side[])
member.summary: Specify which sides will be excluded, and these sides can no longer be dragged to resize the ResizableItem.
member.param: Sides for exclusion as sequence of SpaceVIL.Core.Side.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.GetExcludedSides
member.summary: Getting exclused sides. These sides cannot be dragged to resize the ResizableItem.
member.returns: Sides for exclusion as list of SpaceVIL.Core.Side.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.ClearExcludedSides
member.summary: Removing all exclused sides. After that all sides can be dragged to resize the ResizableItem.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.PositionChanged
member.summary: Event that is invoked when ResizableItem moves.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.SizeChanged
member.summary: Event that is invoked when ResizableItem resizes.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.Release
member.summary:
Disposing all resources if the item was removed.
Notice: This method is mainly for overriding only. SpaceVIL calls this method if necessary and no need to call it manually.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.IsLocked
member.summary:
Property to lock ResizableItem movement and resizing.
True: to lock. False: to unlock.
Default: False.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.IsXResizable
member.summary:
Property to lock ResizableItem resizing by X axis.
True: to unlock. False: to lock.
Default: True.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.IsYResizable
member.summary:
Property to lock ResizableItem resizing by Y axis.
True: to unlock. False: to lock.
Default: True.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.IsXFloating
member.summary:
Property to lock ResizableItem movement by X axis.
True: to unlock. False: to lock.
Default: True.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.IsYFloating
member.summary:
Property to lock ResizableItem movement by Y axis.
True: to unlock. False: to lock.
Default: True.

member.summary: Default ResizableItem constructor.

member.summary: Setting ResizableItem width. If the value is greater/less than the maximum/minimum value of the width, then the width becomes equal to the maximum/minimum value.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ResizableItem.SetHeight(System.Int32)

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.SelectionItem
member.summary:
SelectionItem is designed to be a wrapper (selection showing) of items in special containers that supports item selection such as SpaceVIL.ListBox, SpaceVIL.TreeView, SpaceVIL.WrapGrid.
Can resize by size of wrapped item.
Supports all events except drag and drop.

member.summary: Updating size of SelectionItem according to wrapped item size.

member.summary: Updating width of SelectionItem according to wrapped item width.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SelectionItem.UpdateHeight
member.summary: Updating height of SelectionItem according to wrapped item height.

member.summary: Returns True if SelectionItem is selected otherwise returns False.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.SideArea
member.summary:
SideArea is a container designed to show when it is needed, and the rest of the time SideArea is hidden. SideArea is a floating item (see SpaceVIL.Core.IFloating and enum SpaceVIL.Core.LayoutType) Always attached to one of the four sides of window.
Contains close button and resizable area.
Supports all events except drag and drop.
Notice: All floating items render above all others items.
SideArea does not pass any input events and invisible by default.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.SideArea.Window
member.summary: Resizable container area of SideArea.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.GetAttachSide
member.summary:
Getting the side of the window which SideArea is attached.
Default: Side.Left.
member.returns: Side of the window as SpaceVIL.Core.Side.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.SetAttachSide(SpaceVIL.Core.Side)
member.summary:
Setting the side of the window which SideArea will be attached.
Default: Side.Left.
member.param: Side of the window as SpaceVIL.Core.Side.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.GetAreaSize
member.summary:
Getting actual size of SideArea.
If SideArea is attached to Side.Left or Side.Right, then this value is the width of the area, otherwise, the height.
Default: 300.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.SetAreaSize(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Setting actual size of SideArea.
If SideArea is attached to Side.Left or Side.Right, then this value is the width of the area, otherwise, the height.
Default: 300.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.#ctor(SpaceVIL.CoreWindow,SpaceVIL.Core.Side)
member.summary:
Constructs SideArea with the specified side and the specified window for attachment. (see SpaceVIL.CoreWindow, SpaceVIL.ActiveWindow, SpaceVIL.DialogWindow).
SideArea does not pass any input events and invisible by default.
member.param: Side of the window as SpaceVIL.Core.Side.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.InitElements
member.summary:
Initializing all elements in the SideArea.
Notice: This method is mainly for overriding only. SpaceVIL calls this method if necessary and no need to call it manually.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.AddItem(SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem)
member.summary: Adding item into the SideArea.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.InsertItem(SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem,System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserting item to the SideArea. If the count of container elements is less than the index, then the element is added to the end of the list.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.RemoveItem(SpaceVIL.Core.IBaseItem)
member.summary: Removing the specified item from SideArea.
member.returns: True: if the removal was successful. False: if the removal was unsuccessful.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.SetWidth(System.Int32)
member.summary: Setting SideArea width. If the value is greater/less than the maximum/minimum value of the width, then the width becomes equal to the maximum/minimum value.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.SetHeight(System.Int32)
member.summary: Setting SideArea height. If the value is greater/less than the maximum/minimum value of the height, then the height becomes equal to the maximum/minimum value.

member.summary: Shows the SideArea at the proper position.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.Show(SpaceVIL.Core.IItem,SpaceVIL.Core.MouseArgs)
member.summary: Shows the SideArea at the proper position. This method do exactly as Show() method without arguments.
member.param: The item from which the show request is sent.
Mouse click arguments (cursor position, mouse button, mouse button press/release, etc.).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.Hide
member.summary: Hide the SideArea without destroying.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.Hide(SpaceVIL.Core.MouseArgs)
member.summary: Hide the SideArea without destroying with using specified mouse arguments. This method do exactly as Hide() method without arguments.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.SetStyle(SpaceVIL.Decorations.Style)
member.summary:
Setting style of the SideArea.
Inner styles: "window", "closebutton".

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.SideArea.IsOutsideClickClosable
member.summary: Returns True if SideArea (see SpaceVIL.Core.IFloating) should closes when mouse click outside the area of SideArea otherwise returns False.
member.returns: True: if SideArea closes when mouse click outside the area. False: if SideArea stays opened when mouse click outside the area.

member.summary: Setting boolean value of item's behavior when mouse click occurs outside the SideArea.
member.param: True: SideArea should become invisible if mouse click occurs outside the item. False: an item should stay visible if mouse click occurs outside the item.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.TabView
member.summary:
TabView is a special container designed to group items within specific tab page.
TabView cannot receive any events, so TabView is always in the SpaceVIL.Core.ItemStateType.Base state.

member.summary: Setting the width policy of tabs. Can be Fixed (tab shape not changes its size) or Expand (tab shape is stretched to all available space).

Selecting a tab by its index.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.TabView.SelectTabByName(System.String)
member.summary:
Selecting a tab by its name.
Tab name is ID of UI element. Tab name is uniq but tab text is not.
Explanation: the tab text can be a web address, and there can be several open tabs with the same address.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.TitleBar
member.summary:
TitleBar is the basic implementation of a user interface tittle bar of window.
Extended from SpaceVIL.WindowAnchor. WindowAnchor is class representing the draggable window type of an item.
Contains icon, text, minimize button, maximize button, close button.
Supports all events except drag and drop despite that this class is draggable type.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.TitleBar.Direction
member.summary: Direction of title bar (in Mac OS is HorizontalDirection.FromRightToLeft, in others OS HorizontalDirection.FromLeftToRight).

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.TitleBar.GetIcon
member.summary: Getting icon of title bar.
member.returns: Icon of title bar as SpaceVIL.ImageItem.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.TitleBar.GetCloseButton
member.summary: Getting close button of title bar. This button closes the current window.
member.returns: Close button of title bar as SpaceVIL.TitleBar.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.TitleBar.GetMinimizeButton
member.summary: Getting minimize button of title bar. This button minimizes the window to the taskbar.
member.returns: Minimize button of title bar as SpaceVIL.TitleBar.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.TitleBar.GetMaximizeButton
member.summary: Getting maximize button of title bar. This button maximizes/restores the window to all available space of the current display (display size without task bar and other OS elements).
member.returns: Maximize button of title bar as SpaceVIL.TitleBar.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.TreeItem
member.summary:
TreeItem is designed to be a node for SpaceVIL.TreeView (branch-leaf type of container).
Can be as leaf node or as branch node. Branch node can contains another branches and leafs. Leaf node cannot contains any nodes.
Contains text, icon, indicator (branch only).
Supports all events except drag and drop.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.VerticalStack
member.summary:
VerticalStack is a class that represents a line type container (vertical version). VerticalStack groups items one after another using content alignment, margins, paddings, sizes and size policies. VerticalStack implements SpaceVIL.Core.IVLayout. By default ability to get focus is disabled.
VerticalStack cannot receive any events, so VerticalStack is always in the SpaceVIL.Core.ItemStateType.Base state.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.VerticalStack.SetContentAlignment(SpaceVIL.Core.ItemAlignment)
member.summary:
Setting content alignment within VerticalStack area.
Supports only: ItemAlignment.Top, ItemAlignment.VCenter, ItemAlignment.Bottom.
Default: ItemAlignment.Top.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.VerticalStack.GetContentAlignment
member.summary:
Getting current content alignment.
Can be: ItemAlignment.Top, ItemAlignment.VCenter, ItemAlignment.Bottom.

member.summary: Adding item to the VerticalStack.

member.summary: Inserting item to the VerticalStack container. If the number of container elements is less than the index, then the element is added to the end of the list.

member.summary: Removing the specified item from the VerticalStack container.
member.returns: True: if the removal was successful. False: if the removal was unsuccessful.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.WrapArea
member.summary:
WrapArea is a scrollable container for other elements with ability of selection. WrapArea groups elements in cells of a certain size. It can be oriented vertically or horizontally. WrapArea is part of SpaceVIL.WrapGrid which controls scrolling, resizing and etc.
Supports all events except drag and drop.

Contains list area, scroll bars, scroll menu.
Supports all events except drag and drop.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.ItemsLayoutBox.GetLayoutFloatItems(System.Guid)
member.summary: Getting existing float items in specified window by its GUID. Floating items are independent items that do not have a parent, or their root parent is a floating item. Examples: SideArea, FloatItem, ContextMenu and etc.
member.returns: The list of existing float items in specified window by its GUID.

member.summary: Adding an item to global item storage (ItemsLayoutBox). In usual situation you do not need to use this function only if you create your own implementation of IBaseItem or create a new implementation of IFloatItem.

member.summary: Removing an item from global item storage (ItemsLayoutBox). In usual situation you do not need to use this function only if you create your own implementation of IBaseItem or want to remove IFloatItem instance.
member.param: Type of an item: SpaceVIL.Core.LayoutType.Static or SpaceVIL.Core.LayoutType.Floating
member.returns: True: if removal was successfull. False: if the specified item does not exist in the storage.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsDialog
member.summary:
A flag that determines whether the current window is dialog or not.
True: window is dialog. False: window is NOT dialog.
Default: False.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsClosed
member.summary:
A flag that determines whether the current window is in closed state or not.
True: window is closed. False: window is opened.
Default: True.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsHidden
member.summary:
A flag that determines whether the current window is in hidden state or not.
True: window is hidden. False: window is unhidden.
Default: False.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsResizable
member.summary:
A flag that determines whether the current window can be resize or not.
True: window is resizable. False: window is NOT resizable.
Default: True.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsAlwaysOnTop
member.summary:
A flag that determines whether the current window is always on top of all other windows or not.
True: window is on top. False: window is NOT on top.
Default: False.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsBorderHidden
member.summary:
A flag that shows/hides native the current window border decoration.
True: native window border is HIDDEN. False: native window border is SHOWN.
Default: False.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsCentered
member.summary:
A flag that determines whether the current window will first appear in the center of the screen or not.
True: window is centered. False: window is NOT centered.
Default: True.

members.member:
A flag that determines whether the current window can be in focused state or not.
True: window is focusable. False: window is NOT focusable.
Default: True.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsOutsideClickClosable
member.summary:
A flag that determines whether the current window can be closed if the mouse is clicked outside of the current window or not.
True: window can be closed if the mouse is clicked outside. False: window can NOT be closed if the mouse is clicked outside.
Default: False.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsMaximized
member.summary:
A flag that determines whether the current window will first appear maximized or not.
True: window will first appear maximized. False: window will NOT first appear maximized.
Default: False.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsTransparent
member.summary:
A flag that determines whether the current window can be transparent or not.
True: window can be transparent. False: window can NOT be transparent.
Default: False.

member.name: F:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.IsFullScreen
member.summary:
A flag that determines whether the current window will first appear in fullscreen mode or not.
True: window will first appear in fullscreen mode. False: window will NOT first appear in fullscreen mode.
Default: False.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.SetAntiAliasingQuality(SpaceVIL.Core.MSAA)
member.summary: Setting the anti aliasing quality (off, x2, x4, x8). Default: MSAA.MSAA4x

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.Hold
member.summary:
Makes this window inactive. Window cannot receive and process any input events.
Tip: to restore window activity use CoreWindow.Proceed().

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.CoreWindow.Proceed
member.summary:
Restores window activity. Window may receive and process any input events.
Tip: used with CoreWindow.Hold() method which makes a window inactive.

member.name: T:SpaceVIL.DialogWindow
member.summary:
DialogWindow is an abstract class for modal window instances.
DialogWindow extends CoreWindow class. CoreWindow is an abstract class containing an implementation of common functionality for a window.

Entry type can be FileSystemEntryType.File or FileSystemEntryType.Directory.
Dialog type can be OpenDialogType.Open or OpenDialogType.Save.

Initializing all elements in the OpenEntryBox.

member.summary: Refresh opened folder.

member.name: M:SpaceVIL.OpenEntryBox.AddFilterExtensions(System.String[])
member.summary:
Adding file filter extensions.
Rule: "filter name (*.ext1, *.ext2, *.extN) ; *.ext1, *.ext2, *.extN"
Example 1: "Text files (*.txt) ; *.txt"
Example 2: "Images (*.png, *.bmp, *.jpg) ; *.png, *.bmp, *.jpg"

member.summary: Shows OpenEntryBox window.

member.summary: Closes OpenEntryBox window.

member.summary:
Setting style of the OpenEntryBox.
Inner styles: "window", "layout", "toolbar", "toolbarbutton", "buttonhidden", "addressline", "filenameline", "list", "controlpanel", "okbutton", "cancelbutton", "filter", "filtertext", "divider".
